text: A healthy lifestyle is one which helps to keep and improve people's health and well-being and can also help overcome lots of stress.Participants at the 6th Global Conference on Health Promotion. The Bangkok Charter for health promotion in a globalized world. Geneva, Switzerland: World Health Organization, 2005 Aug 11. Accessed 2009 Feb 4. Many governments and non- governmental organizations work in promoting healthy lifestyles.Kickbusch I. 2003. The contribution of the World Health Organization to a new public health,private and health promotion. Am J Public Health 93(3):383-8. 2009. Healthy living is a lifelong effect. Being healthy includes healthy eating, physical activities, weight management, and stress management. A healthy lifestyle includes a balanced diet. This does not mean cutting out important food groups from your diet or limiting yourself on the amount of calories per day. A well-rounded diet involves eating most food groups in every meal. Meats, dairy, fruits, and vegetables are all important components of a meal that will ensure your body is healthy. Doing a healthy diet brings a lifestyle that can change your life into being healthier and physically fit. According to Jim Rohn, "Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live." Public health educators, including doctor Mike, Sandra Lee,and Yousef Abo Zarad, use social media to share information about healthy lifestyles and dermatologic topics. == Components of a healthy lifestyle == A healthy lifestyle is mostly associated with: * Good diet * Physical exercise * Good sleeping pattern * Personal hygiene * No bad habits or addiction * Health education * Safe environment * Physical fitness * Love through social support and healthy relationships *Emotions * Active social life * eating good foods * having good relationships * sleep == References == == Other websites == * Healthy Cities â€“ WHO EURO Office * Health-EU Portal * Simple Ways to Live a More Mindful Life Health Prevention and Promotion in the EU
